scripts.migration:generate: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec backend pnpm run migration:generate
scripts.migration:run: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec -w /usr/src/app/apps/backend backend pnpm migration:run
scripts.migration:revert: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec backend pnpm run migration:revert
scripts.migration:run:prod: docker-compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml exec -w /usr/src/app/apps/backend backend pnpm migration:run:prod
scripts.migration:generate:prod: docker-compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml exec -w /usr/src/app/apps/backend backend pnpm run migration:generate:prod
scripts.migration:revert:prod: docker-compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml exec -w /usr/src/app/apps/backend backend pnpm run migration:revert:prod
